getPauseConfiguration().details: Returns the current `TemporarilyPausable` configuration that will be applied to Pools created by this factory. `pauseWindowDuration` will decrease over time until it reaches zero, at which point both it and `bufferPeriodDuration` will be zero forever, meaning deployed Pools will not be pausable.

isPoolFromFactory(address).details: Returns true if `pool` was created by this factory.
